item.title: Centos初始化2
item.description:
proxychains-ng

git clone https://github.com/rofl0r/proxychains-ng
cd proxychains-ng                                 
./configure --prefix=/usr --sysconfdir=/etc 
make
make install
make install-config   # 生成配置文件
echo 'http 10.100.100.136 4411' >> /etc/proxychains.conf  # 输入代理设置
